full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 LOS 60-3751 DESIGNATION OF ATTORNEY IN ACT A 11 979 216 (To accept return of United States bonds or notes deposited to secure Immigration bond) KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, That 1 Emanuel Braude, President of the Public Charge Assurance Co., of 356 S. Broadway, L.A. Calif. have made, constituted and appointed, and by these presents do make, constitute and appoint Delia Isabel Delgado of 752 South Carondelet L.A. California my true and lawful attorney for me and in my name, place and stead to rece from the United States Department of Justice, Immigration and Naturalization Service, Governmen securities deposited by the Public Charge Assurance Company Milagros-Jerez, Maria Jerez & on June 1, 1960 In behalf of Delia Isabel Delgado, as follows: a U.S. treasury bond of 1967-72 Series, Coupons #39-54 Incl. face amount $1,000.00, # 409771-A, interest dates June 15 & Dec. 15. giving and granting unto my said attorney full power and authority to do and perform all and every act and thing whatsoever requisite and necessary to be done In and about the premises, as fully to all In- tents and purposes, as I might or could do If personally present, with full power of substitution and revocation, hereby ratifying and confirming all that my said attorney or her substitute shall lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof. (This box is to be completed and signed only where the designation of attorney in fact is coupled with an interest.) For value received I have sold and hereby do grant, assign and convey Irrevocably the said securities unto my attorney in fact above named, forever. (Signature of Designator) IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereto set my hand and seal the 17th. day of July in the year one thousand nine hundred and sixty four Delia Deleado of (SEAL) (Signature Designee) (Signature of Designator) Signed, sealed and delivered in the presence of Emidina (Signature D of (Witness) marguez STATE OF California ) ) SS COUNTY OF Los Angeles ) On the 17th. day of July in the year nineteen hundred and sixty four before me personally came Emanuel Braude to me known and known to me to be the individual des- cribed in and who executed the foregoing Instrument and acknowledged to me executed same. (NOTARY SEAL) Notery that Public he the UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE My commission expires: april, 1968 DATE EXAMINED AND APPROVED All TO LEGAL FORMS AND EXECUTION AND ACCEPTED. MORTON J. PINZ The NOTARY PUBLIC, CALIFORNIA PRINCIPAL OFFICE IN ELES COUNTY (Signature of Officer In Charge) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form 1-312 (Rev. 5-12-59)
